reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

 *RDA*/ Velocity *Coil*/ 6 Wrap Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 wrap *W*/ 45 
*Wicking*/ Full Cotton *Ω*/0.26    
       
**Testing**        

*Steep Time*/3 weeks *% Used*/ 2    
*PG/VG* 50/50 *Nic%*/0    

**Mouth Feel** 

Heavy on the tongue light on the nose. A syrupy and thick mouthfeel, moderately dense 6 out of 10.             
          
**Throat Hit** 1/10           

**Flavor Properties** 

Sweet & sour  plum flavoring with a light hint of smoke, giving it Contrast and just the right amount of sour to set off sweet notes. This one definitely has unami sweet savory and delicious.

**Relatable Flavors** 

This reminds me of eating prunes, a great Plum flavoring that is dry and sweet.

**Off Flavors** 

Sweetness dissipates quickly, and you're left with a dry bitter aftertaste, not unpleasant but I didn't feel was a little off.

**Position In The Recipe** 

As a accent should really help dry out a recipe, adding savory too sweet flavorings, and provide contrast. Can also  work well as a base note to build on. 

**Pairings**  

Other Stone fruits, berrys, tropical fruits, tobacco's, bakeries, and other Savory flavors such as INW shisha Rosemary.      

**Recipe**

https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/6882       
       
**Notes**    

http://www.ecigexpress.com/catalogsearch/result/?q=smoked+Plum           

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suanmeitang

**Rating** 90/100  

*Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.*
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Smoked Plum
